title: Foods and Festivals of the Danube Lands: Germany, Austria, Czechoslovakia, Hungary, Yugoslavia, Bulgaria, Romania, Russia
description: Schnitzels and strudels, sausages, dumplings, and tortes -- the favorite foods of the countries bordering the Danube -- are mouth-wateringly described and illuminatingly explained by Lila Perl as she traces this "highway of history" from the castle-studded wine country of Austria to the Black Sea. History, recipes, heritage -- it's all here in this treasury!
author: Lila Perl
